results.title: Colourful concrete
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Researchers”.
A new product from two technologies. Researchers find that an attractive, permanent weatherproof glaze can be made on a strong concrete block.

results.title: Clear, clean water
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Researchers”.
Outlines a new process for water purification called Sirofloc, developed by the CSIRO, and explains it in the context of Australia’s limited water resources. Looks at the first commercial plant in Perth.

results.title: Better weather forecasting
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Researchers”.
The Australian Numerical Meteorological Research Centre uses high powered computers, mathematical models and information from the Bureau of Meteorology in their attempts to improve weather forecasting.

results.title: Australia's most expensive tick
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Researchers”.
Extensive research is uncovering a great deal of information about the cattle tick which costs the beef industry of Northern Australia millions of dollars each year.
